price: ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߛߌߟߊ߲ߣߍ߲߫ ߞߍ߫ ߘߴߊ߬ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߓߘߊ߫ ߟߐ ߢߍ߫ ߛߊ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߣߌ ߝߊߕߊ߲ߕߌ߫ ߣߋ߬ߦߌ ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߬
arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفۡسَ عَنِ ٱلۡهَوَىٰ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā man khāfa maqāma rabbihi wanahā al-nafsa ʿani al-hawā
